sentences.en: Are you also a horseman, sir?
sentences.cn: 路人:先生你也是骑士 吗 ?

sentences.en: Each horseman has about 800 k health.
sentences.cn: 每个马人有大约80万生命.
杰拉尔德是个出色的骑手。

sentences.en: He a first - class horseman and musician.
sentences.cn: 他是 一流 的骑手和音乐家.

sentences.en: He can ride a horse like a horseman.
sentences.cn: 他马骑得和骑手一样好.
他见一骑马人正在走近.

sentences.en: He told us the legend of the ghostly horseman.
sentences.cn: 他给我们讲幽灵骑士的传说.

sentences.en: He was the first to spy the horseman in the distance.
sentences.cn: 他最先看到出现在远处的骑者.

sentences.en: However , when the horseman got hare, he rode off as fast as he could.
sentences.cn: 他一拿住兔子, 就骑马飞快地跑了.

sentences.en: I am the one horseman of the Apocalypse.
sentences.cn: 我是伟大的天命骑士之一.

sentences.en: I was dressed as a horseman at the ball.
sentences.cn: 在舞会上我装扮成骑士.

sentences.en: The horseman aimed his lance at his quarry.
sentences.cn: 骑手把长矛对准了他的猎物.

sentences.en: The horseman came up to Robin Hood, brandishing his sword.
sentences.cn: 那个骑士挥舞着剑,来到罗宾汉面前.
那骑士轻轻地摇了缰绳.

sentences.en: You seek the warrior bathed in blood, the Headless Horseman.
sentences.cn: 你找寻在血中沐浴的勇士, 那个无头骑士.

trans.tran_cn: 骑手，马术师，马术运动员，养马人
